[b]Custom Home[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9u5gr4.png[/img]
[b]We reached 42 online in the first week very active community[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2i9ih5f.png[/img]
[b]Penguins are easy to make money[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/347jpz4.png[/img] [b]We got some quite unique features custom coded[/b] [img]http://trickscape.org/2.png[/img] [b] You can go nex too..[/b] [img]http://trickscape.org/3.png[/img] [b]::chill zone[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/x1lks1.png[/img]
[b]Info: [/b]
- Custom Home Really Unique - Custom Food System Heals up to 57 - Nex advanced alot hp not too strongDrops quick - Penguins C-Chest - Easy Obtaining items. - All skills are trainable - Friendly staff members - Open Moderator Spots
Dedicated Server with windows server 2012:

item.title: TrickScape | Penguins | 24-7 Dedi | Custom Home | Custom food system
item.dc:creator: @trickscape317 trickscape317
item.description:
@trickscape317 wrote:

[quote author=eclipse rsps link=topic=640834.msg4324856#msg4324856 date=1372721667]
Im sure your server will become very popular, especially because [quote=“trickscape317, post:12, topic:522328”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=640834.msg4324395#msg4324395 date=1372650846]
I give them what they want, they want to make easy money so i give it to them.

[/quote][/quote]

Yes, also i worked on a better economy now by adding a new [Crystal Game] minigame.
Well its not that kinda unique but its a new feature

this is how it goes:

you go to kardia for red dragons.
there is a chest (which gives you good items)
you have to kill red dragons

they drop:

Dragonkin Key ( Gives you the ability to open D chest)
Dragonkin Lamp ( Gives 50K slayer XP )

well what happens next:

Players are making money, and they start more pking.

Read full topic

item.title: TrickScape | Penguins | 24-7 Dedi | Custom Home | Custom food system
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“trickscape317, post:12, topic:522328”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=640834.msg4324395#msg4324395 date=1372650846]
I went on the server for a couple of minutes and saw that their economy is horrible. I saw people making offers around 700m+ for things.
[/quote]

I dont like it either but this is how players like it.
I give them what they want, they want to make easy money so i give it to them.
Also i agree it’s too easy that is what makes people stay for some reason.
But ill change it to a new mini-game and make it more harder because this is the way players like to make money.

this is probably another shitty trisidiax server, i bet u that there is nothing done to the server besides adding penguins and a new home.

I know about 20 dupes and many glitches. Now, you would be loving retarded not taking this advice, change your base.

There are many things fixed, also other servers doesn’t have that many features why do you guys hate trisidiaX or Deathlypvpz v4.
Its great to start off with and anyways where is your server? its just a advertisement page not a discussion of how its made.
You think your the greatest coder around here well stfu, ill show you how populair TrickScape will become.
Also every glitch and bug will be fixed, i guess that guy i can’t remember him, also i dont know who banned him maybe a co-owner
I agree on making something your own, but this is how players like it and i respect it.

  • TrickScape[/quote]
    Please don’t tell me to stfu, btw your server is just full of tutorials, I bet I’m a better coder aswell, i am not saying im the best, im not even that good, but good enough to make a successful server…
    OT: Gl i guess.
    One more thing, i don’t think leeching deathlypvpz v4 makes your server good.

Read full topic
item.source: TrickScape | Penguins | 24-7 Dedi | Custom Home | Custom food system

item.title: TrickScape | Penguins | 24-7 Dedi | Custom Home | Custom food system
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You think your the greatest coder around here well stfu, ill show you how populair TrickScape will become.

Nope, Flame_ is the best.

Its great to start off with and anyways where is your server?

Not worth it

its just a advertisement page not a discussion of how its made.

Actually, this is an advertisement page, where we discuss and criticize the server on experience/media.

[hr]

OT: My thoughts on the media itself. I don’t think enough features are really shown to get a good idea of how the server is represented and what it has to offer. You also don’t elaborate on exactly what the penguins do. Is this a D&D or is this simply a kill the penguin, get a drop type of deal cause then it’s nothing really worth of showing in media imo.

I find it unprofessional to show a pring hit on any monster/boss as well as that doesn’t show us weapon accuracy but just that you have a boss.

As I said though at the current state…it’s hard to tell what’s what and what features are really any good.

5/10 until more media is posted.

Read full topic

[quote=“trickscape317, post:4, topic:522328”]Well give me your ingame name.
